description: You look for a place to stay in this new city. You have 2 options: Number 1. Rent Rs 4000 per month; shared with 2 other people; commuting will cost 20 Rs per day. Number 2. Rent Rs 2000 per month; shared with 4 other people; commuting will cost 40 Rs per day. Which option do you choose?
options: [{"id":1,"description":"Option 1","action":{"expenditure":4600,"debt":0,"current":0,"events":[]},"audio":{"HI":"event_3_option_1.mp3"},"translation":{"HI":"विकल्प 1"}},{"id":2,"description":"Option 2","action":{"expenditure":3200,"debt":0,"current":0,"events":[]},"audio":{"HI":"event_3_option_2.mp3"},"translation":{"HI":"विकल्प 2"}}]

title: You look for a place to stay in this new city. You have 2 options: Number 1. Rent Rs 4000 per month; shared with 2 other people; commuting will cost 20 Rs per day. Number 2. Rent Rs 2000 per month; shared with 4 other people; commuting will cost 40 Rs per day. Which option do you choose?

description: You get married. How much do you spend on the wedding from your end?
